# Keyword Groups {#sec-keygroups}



## Provider Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prov <- providertwo::load_provider() |> 
  collapse::colorder(theme, title)

prov <- collapse::rsplit(prov, ~ theme)

prov
```
